name: Boop & Bebop
description:
This game has been made for Wowie! Jam 4.0 - 2022

This year's theme was "Collaborate with AI".

In Boop & Bebop, your fellow robot companion takes any commands that you give them by throwing rocks around. They'll float around, pick up and drop cubes around and help you solve puzzles through this cute little adventure!

Overview

Boop & Bebop is a light-hearted Platformer/Puzzle game where you play as Boop, a two-legged cat, accompanied by Bebop, a floating TV screen that helps you solve puzzles.

Gameplay

Bebop follows you everywhere you go. Throw a rock and they'll go there - throw it on a crate and they'll pick it up for you - throw a rock on them and they'll drop it for you! (Just be careful not to hit them too many times, or they'll get mad at you!)
